summary: The story of Queens Park Rangers FC's comeback from the brink of bankruptcy in 2007.
cast: Alejandro Agag|Gareth Ainsworth|Amit Bhatia|Flavio Briatore|Iain Dowie|Bernie Ecclestone|Hogan Ephraim|John Harbin|Mick Harford|Paul Hart|Clint Hill|Mikele Leigertwood|Jim Magilton|Gianni Paladini|Queens Park Rangers F.C.|Paulo Sousa|Neil Warnock
title: The Four Year Plan
